title: Why Airlines Can’t Stop Rewriting the Rules for Fliers
sub_head: Travelers usually miss these slight changes to the rules, but over time the tweaks have eroded customer rights
body:
American Airlines changed the terms on its tickets last month to say that its “sole obligation” for flight cancellations or missed connections is to refund the remaining portion of your ticket.
That sounded like the airline was going to leave a whole lot of people stranded.
